TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi DispatcherFrame extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject

Docs.summary: Represents an execution loop in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks objects typically fall into two categories: - Long running, general purpose frames that exit only when instructed to. These frames should exit when they are requested. - Short running, very specific frames that exit when an important criteria is met. These frames may consider not to exit when they are requested in favor of waiting for their exit criteria to be met. These frames should have a time-out associated with them. ## XAML Text Usage You cannot use this managed class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples The following example shows how to use a to achieve similar results as the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] method. [!code-csharp[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)] [!code-vb[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> typically fall into two categories:
- Long running, general purpose frames, that exit only when instructed to. These frames should exit when they are requested.
- Short running, very specific frames that exit when an important criteria is met. These frames may consider not exiting when they are requested in favor of waiting for their exit criteria to be met. These frames should have a time-out associated with them.
-
- At application shutdown, all frames are request to exit.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Continue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this should continue.
Docs.value: if the frame should continue; otherwise, . The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks is queried at the top of each dispatcher loop. At application shutdown, all frames are request to exit. ## XAML Text Usage Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or cannot be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples The following example shows how to use a to achieve similar results as the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] method. [!code-csharp[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)] [!code-vb[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)]
